draw.overall_supervision_plan: The conditions for safe range operations will begin with proper preparation of all firers. Firers will receive PMI prior to attending the range. The Range operators (OIC, RSO, Safeties) will enforce standards of discipline and safe firing operations on the range. All range personnel will monitor all firers at all times and strict attention to detail will be placed on the control of personnel movement to/from the target and to/from the holding areas. Medics and/or CLS Personnel will be on standby with a CASEVAC vehicle and an aid bag. Medics and/or CLS Personnel will have a strip map to the hospital/Central City and leaders will know the route. All spouses will be monitored while on the range to ensure safe operations.
